description: Detects the use of the spoolss named pipe over SMB. This can be used to trigger the authentication via NTLM of any machine that has the spoolservice enabled. Author: OTR (Open Threat Research), @neu5ron. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Domain Controllers that are sometimes, commonly although should not be, acting as printer servers too
name: SMB Spoolss Name Piped Usage
